product_name: Pearl Izumi X-Alp Enduro IV Bike Shoes - Women's
long_description: Hit the trail in the women's Pearl Izumi X-Alp Enduro IV Bike Shoes and enjoy the performance of a fast, lightweight shoe with a ratchet buckle closure and the comfort of walkable lugged rubber soles. Anatomic buckle closure system reduces hot spots and removes pressure from your instep. Low-cut construction gives the Pearl Izumi X-Alp Enduro IV Bike Shoes a lightweight, fast fit and feel. Quick-drying, highly breathable mesh/synthetic uppers deliver comfort. EVA foam midsoles are like what's in your running shoes, offering walking comfort off the bike. Carbon-rubber lugged outsoles provide superior traction and durability.
short_description: Hit the trail in the women's Pearl Izumi X-Alp Enduro IV Bike Shoes and enjoy the performance of a fast, lightweight shoe with a ratchet buckle closure and the comfort of walkable lugged rubber soles.
